entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
